name: Senior Audit Specialist
description:
Hayat Marketing is a leading player in the FMCG industry and one of the largest global Turkish companies. The company specializes in the production of hygienic paper products, brands Papia, Familia, Focus, hygiene products for women Molped, hygiene products for kids Molfix, diapers for adults Joly and Evony.

According to the world independent information publication Tissue World, Hayat Marketing is the company with the fastest rate of investment for the last 5 years. We are presented in 14 countries, using systems that comply with European standards, and we offer products to consumers through an export network covering more than 100 countries.

The vacancy will be opened from January 2022.

Responsibilities

  • Execute Continuous Control Monitoring System (CCMS) transactions; follow up automated control exception reports regarding processes, based on transactional data.
  • Interacting with HQ Audit Analytics Manager and Regional Audit Manager regarding the implementation of new scenarios based on transactional data.
  • Conduct planned audit engagements in coordination with Regional Audit and Global Audit Heads.
  • Assist in conducting investigations.
  • Communicate audit results with process owners and report final outputs to the top management.

Requirements

  • An undergraduate degree in economics, business administration or relevant engineering departments of universities.
  • Good knowledge of English (at least Upper Intermediate, spoken and written).
  • Strong use of MS Excel.
  • Analytics tools like Power BI, and query languages such as SQL, R, and Python would be a great plus.
  • Knowledge of SAP ERP system would be an advantage.
  • Knowledge in accounting, finance and relevant legislation would be an advantage.
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills with all levels within the organization.
  • Strong problem solving, analytical thinking and reporting skills.
  • No travel restriction.

We offer:

  • Work in a stable international company;
  • Lunch and transport compensations;
  • Office in Moscow City;
  • Flexible working day;
  • Medical insurance;
  • Friendly team of professionals.

If you are quality oriented, ready to work in a team, develop and achieve business goals, then we look forward to your CV!
